document_data.name: Nestra Ruthiol
document_data.mainbody: '''Nestra Ruthiol''' was the ruler of [[Yartar]] and a member of the [[Lords' Alliance]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Nestra considered her allegiance to the Lords' Alliance vital for the survival and prosperity of her city. She permitted the [[Harpers]] and [[Zhentarim]] to travel the streets, but she only dealt with them when it was absolutely necessary.
document_data.History:
Ruthiol was accused of murdering a former lover, [[Kaidrod Palyr]], after arguing publicly with his wife, [[Tiarshe Palyr|Tiarshe]]. While she was cleared of the charges, some speculated that the [[Hand of Yartar]] criminal organization was involved.

She ruled Yartar while the [[Elemental Evil]] crisis of [[1491 DR]] occurred.
